pl.dfa.learner.automaton.pso

Class Evaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.dfa.learner.automaton.pso.Evaluator

  • public class Evaluator
extends Object
    Class used to evaluate solutions. Based on the word sets, divided into acceptable and unacceptable words.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public double evaluate(Solution solution)
        Evaluates a solution. The evaluation is calculated as an overall ratio for the correctly accepted vs. incorrectly accepted words for the word set defined for this evaluator and the automaton represented by the solution. Word is correctly accepted if the word is accepted in the word set and the solution automaton also accepts it and, conversely, if the word is not accepted in the word set and the automaton is rejecting it. In all other cases, the word is not accepted. In the best possible case where all the words are correctly accepted, the evaluation equals to zero. In the worst case, where all words are accepted incorrectly, the evaluation is equal to one ` (case where the solution is an inverse of the DFA that created the word set).
        Parameters:
        solution - solution to evaluate
        Returns:
        ratio of correctly accepted words

      • evaluateVerbose

        public List<List<Integer>> evaluateVerbose(Solution solution)
        Evaluates the solution and returns the list of incorrectly accepted words.
        Parameters:
        solution - solution to evaluate
        Returns:
        incorrectly evaluated words
